thread.title: Modi’s budget cuts hurt India’s fight against malnutrition, Maneka Gandhi says
thread.title_full: Modi’s budget cuts hurt India’s fight against malnutrition, Maneka Gandhi says - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Modi’s budget cuts hurt India’s fight against malnutrition, Maneka Gandhi says
text: Cabinet minister Maneka Gandhi said India's main programme to fight child malnutrition has been hit by budget cuts that make it difficult to pay wages of millions of health workers. She said the issue really calls for huge attention. »
